required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Trial of Ketotifen in Children and Adolescents
clinical_study.official_title: Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Cross-over Trial of Ketotifen in Children and Adolescents With Functional Dyspepsia in Association With Duodenal Eosinophilia

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a double-blind, placebo -controlled, cross-over trial of ketotifen in children ages 8 through 17 inclusive that have a diagnosis of Functional Dyspepsia and have had continued pain despite acid reduction therapy in combination with montelukast. This study is 147 days for subjects responsive to the ketotifen and 63 days for those who are not. The study includes scheduled visits including a physical, blood draws, and questionaires.

detailed_description.textblock:
The primary aim is to assess the symptomatic response to ketotifen as compared to placebo in children and adolescents with functional dyspepsia in association with duodenal eosinophilia who have previously had worsening, no clinical change, or only a partial response to acid-reduction therapy in combination with montelukast.
Secondary aims include: 1) assessing the impact of ketotifen as compared to placebo on quality of life; 2) assessing the impact of ketotifen as compared to placebo on state and trait anxiety; 3) assessing whether baseline trait anxiety is predictive of clinical response to ketotifen; 4) assessing whether functional dyspepsia subtype is predictive of response to ketotifen, 5) assessing the sustainability of response to ketotifen in initial responders, and 6) assessing the pharmacokinetics of ketotifen in this patient population.

primary_outcome.measure: Complete Physical (the study physician will check all systems and ask questions about pain and symptoms) Change is being assessed.
primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period.
primary_outcome.description: Physician directed physical (the study physician will check all systems and ask questions about pain and symptoms). This is a comprehensive system check to ensure safety.

primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period
primary_outcome.description: A Trained professional to complete blood pressure. To ensure value is within normal range and ensure safety of patient.

primary_outcome.measure: Liver Functioning Test (a test ran from a blood sample to check a patients liver functioning)Change is being assessed.
primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period
primary_outcome.description: Blood Sample collected and tested by a Certified Laboratory. Liver Functioning Test (a test ran from a blood sample to check a patients liver functioning). This will be completed and verified to be within normal ranges by the study physician to ensure patient safety.

primary_outcome.measure: State-Trait Inventory for Cognitive and Somatic Anxiety - Child Version, Change is being assessed.
primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period
primary_outcome.description: Anxiety Score testing via questionaire. This will be used to look at how anxiety corelates with pain.

primary_outcome.measure: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory, Change is being assessed.
primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period
primary_outcome.description: Quality of life survey for pediatrics. This will be completed to ensure maintenance of quality of life throughout study.

primary_outcome.measure: Heart Rate, Change is being assessed.
primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period
primary_outcome.description: A Trained professional to complete heart rate. To ensure value is within normal range and ensure safety of patient.

primary_outcome.measure: Respiratory Rate, Change is being assessed.
primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period
primary_outcome.description: A Trained professional to complete respiratory rate. To ensure value is within normal range and ensure safety of patient.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics Sampling(Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)) , Change is being assessed.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics sampling to be completed for safety. This will be completed to evaluate the entire process of the drug breakdown by the body and ensure long term-effects and safety.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics Sampling(Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax)), Change is being assessed.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: day 0, day 28, day 63, and day 147. Change is being assessed from each time period
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics sampling to be completed for safety.This will be completed to evaluate the entire process of the drug breakdown by the body and ensure long term-effects and safety.

arm_group.description: In this arm patients will begin the active Ketotifen treatment first and cross over to the placebo.
In this arm patients will begin the placebo treatment first and cross over to the active Ketotifen.

intervention.description: Ketotifen is a anti-histamine approved by the U.S. FDA to prevent and treat itching of the eyes caused by allergies.
